section.53: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as say- ing:The perspiration would spread on the Day of Resurrection upon the earth to the extent of seventy cubits and it would reach up to their mouths or up to their ears. Thaur is not sure (which words) he used (mouth or ears)
